languageKey.label: Explanation
Here you can choose what type of content object you are going to place.

Content Type: Core
This object is the heart of the webshop and must be added on a page. Adviced to put it in the middle content column of the page.

Content Type: Basket
This object is to show the shoppingcart basket. Adviced to put it in the right content column of the page.

Content Type: Category Listing
This object is to show the catalog menu. Adviced to put it in the left content column of the page.

Content Type: Specials
This object is to show some specials.
Explanation
Some content objects allow additional parameters.

Content Type: Core
Here are no parameters available.

Content Type: Basket
Here are no parameters available.

Content Type: Specials
Here you can specify additional parameters to configure the Specials Box.

Limit
This parameter will limit the results. Example: limit=5

Random
This parameter will randomize the results. Example: random=1
Explanation
